title: T206 Graded: Cobb, Johnson, Chase, Chance, Joss
author: Runscott

posts.post_title: T206 Graded: Cobb, Johnson, Chase, Chance, Joss
posts.post_content:
Please send emails to runscott at gmail.com.  Prices include shipping - paid for by money order, check (if I know you), or Paypal gift. Delivered priority insured.

-Chance factory 25 replaced with a tougher factory 42. Just sold the 25 on ebay for $134, so not sure why it was getting moldy here.
-Reduced prices on the Cobb, Johnson, and Joss but can't go any lower.

Now that my auctions have ended, I'll spend the next few days scanning and pricing cards that some of you have asked about - emails will be going out by Friday. Sorry for the delay, and thanks for your business.

Left-click on icon to see full-size card image:

[URL="http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/ST206-229JohS40.jpeg"][IMG]http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/Icons/IT206JohnsonArms40.jpg[/IMG][/URL] 
Johnson/Hands At Chest SC 350-460 25 SGC 40 VG 3

Joss/Pitching PB SGC 40 VG 3

Chance factory 25 replaced with a tougher factory 42.  Just sold the 25 on ebay for $134, so not sure why it was getting moldy here.

Reduced prices on the Cobb, Johnson, and Joss but can't go any lower.

Prices include shipping - paid for by money order, check (if I know you), or Paypal gift.  Delivered priority insured.

Now that my auctions have ended, I'll spend the next few days scanning and pricing cards that some of you have asked about - emails will be going out by Friday.  Sorry for the delay, and thanks for your business.
